title: I'm Real - Murder Remix
lyrics: whisper: murder incwhat's my mother fucking name?r-u-l-eblowin back on this mary jane i'm analyzing the game(and the game unchoose me)bring pain to pussy niggas and pussy holes they one in the same(every since you told me)there's only room for two,i been making less room for you(now only god can hold me)hug me,love me,judge me,the only man that hoves above me...holla!Verse 1 by jLo:i met so many men,it's like they're all the samemy apetite for lovin'is now my hunger pain!and when i'm feeling sexywho's gonna come for me?my only problem is,their insecurityforwards chorus ja rule and jLo:are you tired of bein' alone?yeah,yeahsick of arguin' on the phone?yeah,yeahwhy you telling all ya friends?yeah,yeahbut your nigga don't understand...my lovechorus by jLo and ja rule:cuz i'm realthe way you walkthe way you move the way you talkcuz i'm realthe way you starethe way you lookthe style you wearcuz i'm realthe way you smilethe way you smellit drives me wildcuz i'm realand i can't go on without youverse 2 by ja rule:i've been thinking 'bout the re-lation-shipand i wanna know is this as good as it gets?cuz we been through the worst times and the best timesbut it was our time even if it was part-timenow they been looking at me smiling at melaughing like we wasn't happybut not knowing that we growin' and we gettin' marriedhard lovin' straight thuggin'bitch i ain't doing this shit for nothingi'm here to get it poppin' and hoppin'lets ride out in the benz,hair blowing in the windsun glistening off my skinhey!i'm nasty,you know me,but your still gonna fuck witcha baby...chorusverse 3 by jLo:now people lovin' me and hatin' me,treatin me ungreatfully,but not knowin' that they ain't makin' or breakin' memy life,i live it to the limit and love itnow i can breathe again baby now i can breathe againnow people screaming "what the deal with you and so-and-so?"i tell'em niggas mind their biz but don't hear me thoughcuz i live life to the limitnow i can breathe again baby now i can breathe againforward choruschorus chorus instrumental fade
